title: Water Safety for Cooling Towers, Domestic Water Holding Tanks, and Supplemental Disinfection Systems
subject: subject index

abstracts.abstract: Water Safety for Cooling Towers, Domestic Water Holding Tanks, and Supplemental Disinfection Systems;  Provides registration, reporting, inspection, & maintenance requirements for cooling towers, domestic water storage tanks, & supplemental disinfection systems; provides duties of DOH & county health departments regarding cooling towers; provides civil & criminal penalties; requires State Surgeon General to submit report to Legislature; provides for waivers & variances.
